subject: Re: NoSuchMethodError: FileUtils.close(Writer)
msgSnippet: Is the close method being called from an anonymous or inner class? I know that in JRE 1.3.1_x there was a problem with this. Just a thought. Mark

Is the close method being called from an anonymous or inner class?

I know =
that in JRE 1.3.1_x there was a problem with this.

Just a thought.

Mark

=
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Lipofsky" <daniel.lipofsky@...>
